Nightlight/Baby::

Nightlight layed down and she settled down her and her baby. Soon, 
Nightlight fell sleep while she huged with one arme her baby.

But the baby didn't like sleep, she was moving and gigling around, 
she liked know more about where she was but she can free her self 
from mommy's arm




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : : 
> Rodimus Prime: Yeah, I'll go see what he needed to talk about. You 
try to get some sleep. 
> Rodimus gets up and walks out of the bedroom portion of their 
quarters, and to the door. He presses the button opening it. He then 
motions Ultra Magnus in, as he sits on the couch. 
> Rodimus Prime: It's good to see you. What did you need to talk 
about, old friend? 
>  "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" <airly2002@h...> wrote: Nightlight:
> 
> Nighlight huged him with one arm while with the other she hold the 
> baby, and kissed Roddy cheek. 
> 
> "Magnus in outside"sadi sofltly the femme 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :

> will have together.
> > He kissed her forehead.

war,

now... 
> > It's diferent... If my neve had been discovered, I never would 
> meet 
> > you.. Now in spite of this war, I'm happy to be in your side..."
> >

was

> >

family,

but 
> was

> > > > weak. He picks her up into his arms, along with the baby.

> need

> > > > baby will need an Ionic shower(I'm stealing things from Star

> > for his 
> > > > quarters. 
> > > > A lot was on his mind right now. So much had happened

> > His falling in 
> > > > love with Nightlight, the birth of their daughter, it was 
all

> > > > family. However he was still the General Commander of a

> > force in the 
> > > > middle of the Neo Beast Wars. Not to mention that he was the

> > > > One," Rodimus Prime. That meant that no telling how many 
past

> > > > Predacons wanted him dead. Life was complicated....

> > > >
